bannerComponent.bannerParagraph: I was born on February 10, 1989 in Palmira Valle. I am dedicated to development frontend 3 years ago in which I have participated in the development of sites web and small applications. I have basic knowledge in Backend and in the management of relational and non-relational databases...

modalComponent.modalParagraphTop: I consider myself a simple, respectful and sociable person. Passionate about life, entrepreneurship and technology. my virtues are:
modalComponent.modalParagraphBottom: I love formula 1, going to the movies and sharing with the family. In the medium term, I hope to finish my technical degree in software development and start with engineering.

certificatesAccordeonOne.accordeonParagraphOne: Construction of accessible and adaptable websites for mobile devices implementing html, css (sass) and bootstrap, javascript and jquery, use of conditionals, functions, loops, arrays, objects, promises and apis consumption with fetch.

certificatesAccordeonTwo.accordeonParagraphTwo: Make SPA projects (single page application) with angular implement components, custom modules, directives, dependency injection, reactive forms, templates forms, form validation, routing, lazy loading, services, guards, classes and interfaces, apis consummation and unit tests.

certificatesAccordeonThree.accordeonParagraphThree: Make servers with node.js using express framework and implementing modules like morgan, cors, mysql, mongoose, jwt, bcrypt, using environment variables, make apis for subsequent get, delete, and update requests, server-side data validation, and interaction with mysql or mongoDB databases.

certificatesAccordeonFour.accordeonParagraphFour: I am currently studying the SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT TECHNICIAN career in virtual mode on monday, tuesday, wednesday and friday and face-to-face on thursday, which began on 16/05/2022 and finish on 15/09/2023.

customersComponent.customersCardParagraphOne: From the beginning I saw his desire to learn, so I decided to be his tutor and help him in his goal of being a software developer.
customersComponent.customersCardParagraphTwo: He has quickly adapted to our work team, follows and applies each instruction to carry out the development of the projects in which He has participated.

contactsComponent.contactsParagraph: Leave me an email and I will try to contact you as soon as possible, do not forget that all the fields of the form are required...
contactsComponent.contactsInputErrorText: From 4 to 16 digits no symbols no numbers
